dict.acceptation: 开收据；[美国英语]给…开收据，承认收到；

sent.orig: Upon receipt of a commission to write a receipt, and receipt of direct written commissions!
sent.trans: 收了好处费还写收据，而且收据上直接写着好处费！

sent.orig: Please send the transfer receipt with the donation form to the address for a donation receipt.
sent.trans: 请将转账收据和捐款表格一并寄回上述地址。

sent.orig: Upon receipt of fine, tax authorities shall issue a receipt.
sent.trans: 税务机关罚款必须开付收据。

sent.orig: Invoice means the receipt with paid tax. Receipt has wider meaning than invoice.
sent.trans: 发票是付了税的收据，而收据指的范围比发票更广泛。

sent.orig: A mate's receipt receipt issued by a carrier.
sent.trans: 大副收据承运人签发，并且可以换成提单。
